duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the restaurant chef in overseeing the restaurant operation and the preparation of food items.
Hiring, training, scheduling, and directing culinary staff.
Visually inspecting all food products to ensure they meet the quality standards set by management.
Ensuring cleanliness, sanitation, and safety in the kitchen and storage areas while minimizing waste and maximizing cost/production ratio.

education_certification.credential: 1 year or more experience in a high-volume restaurant/food outlets production kitchen.
1 year or more of culinary supervisory experience in restaurant and food service with inventory and purchasing knowledge.
Experience with P&L accountability and/or managed food service experience with a proven ability to successfully control food costs is preferred.
